title: SALMON APPLE BURGERS
directions: In a large bowl, beat egg slightly. Add salmon, jalapeno peppers, apple, red pepper, BBQ sauce, and mix well. Shape salmon mixture into 2 1/2 inch balls. Meanwhile, heat a medium size skillet with olive oil. Place balls in skillet and flatten with spatula. Saute in skillet until light or medium golden brown.
ingredients: 1× 10 oz can	Skinless/boneless Salmon Drained & Rinsed
½ cup	Jack Daniels Bbq Sauce
¼ cup	Red Bell Pepper, chopped
¼ cup	Apple, peeled and copped
